_sText:
= Surf_School_Fix by Sid =

Surf_School was originally a commissioned map, but over the past year it has been added to many servers on CS:GO, and was initially released with some issues overlooked. Now the fixed version is available for Source!

With the intent to be a training grounds, each stage is progressively harder, and introduces newer players to the type of obstacles they will encounter in skill surf. Using a hybrid layout, each stage can be tackled individually, or you can carry your speed from the previous stage to compete for the fastest time.

- Tier 1 Staged/Linear, 10 stages
- Bunnyhop Bonus (Originally planned for Surf_Beverages!)

!! IMPORTANT !! Auto-bunnyhop must be enabled for the best experience!
